title: How to Make a Crab Louie Salad

steps.headline: Combine the mayonnaise, ketchup, relish, olives, and eggs in a large mixing bowl.
Spread the lettuce around a large plate or serving dish.
Layer the crab meat, avocado, tomatoes, and asparagus onto the lettuce.

text: Combine the mayonnaise, ketchup, relish, olives, and eggs in a large mixing bowl.  Spread the lettuce around a large plate or serving dish.  Layer the crab meat, avocado, tomatoes, and asparagus onto the lettuce.  Drizzle the dressing on top.
